Name: Jim Raynor
Description:
No one knows when would Mengsk's domination meet its end and who would rescue the suffering people.
Only endless glorification of their 'mighty' leader and charges of rigid rebels can be heard from the broadcasting.Rebels, despicable and merciless, never forget their bloody nature. They slaughtered one after another when they dashed through systems like rats, trying to escape from the suppressions.
However, a legendary rebel's named would accidently be spoken of during farmer and miners' free time.
Jim Raynor.
Those innocents believed that there is a madness most criminal dislikes killing but saving, saving those miners, farmers and slaves, offering them weapons, leading them to fight.
Those innocents also believed that he will appear in the glow of the setting sun with a bright smile on his face and be equipped with a suit of pure black armour which has a Heaven's Devils logo on it. He might shoot off Mengsk's stooges' heads. And he always appears with a background music band!
"That's just a tale. Jim Raynor is nothing more than a murderer." said a mechanic with a hat, snuffing off his cigarette.
"I don't know, Kaczynski. But I hope I can meet this Mr. Cowboy since such tale exists. "Rory Swann clapped the tongs on his left hand, somehow trying to encourage himself, and continued,"At least everybody shouldn't die bewilderedly in the middle of nowhere."
"Hey, buddy, let's have a drink. We should talk. Your hand looks quite cool."
Even Swann, who was always casual, was supervised by such way of greeting. Not until he had been in a trance for several seconds did he take the beer mug from Raynor, gulp it, and laugh heartily with his bushy beards swaying in the air.
"Show me your outfits, Mr. Cowboy. and I can make it the same cool as my hand does!"

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Raynor will hold the gun, charge it for 1 second, and deal 50 damage to the enemy units within the path.
Root.Name: No.12 Strike Bullet

Root.Tooltip: Equip Bio-booster Armor for 15 seconds. Bio-booster Armor is good at charging into the battlefield and taking huge amount of damage. Can use Gunpower Storm, Nerve Rope, and Energy Reagent.
Root.Name: Bio-booster Armor

Root.Tooltip: Eject the unit with potent stimulant, significantly increase its movement and attack speed, last15.0second. Yet, the unit will instantly lose10 health.
Root.Name: Stimpack

Root.Tooltip: Advanced targeting systems on the Hyperion increase the attack damage dealt of all nearby friendly units by 2.
Root.Name: Advanced Targeting Systems

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 14.
Root.Name: Advanced Targeting Systems

Root.Tooltip: Equip Doom Armor for 15 seconds. Doom Armor is good at rapid support and battlefield disruption. Can use Atomic Charge, Atomic Warp, and Doom Laser.
Root.Name: Doom Armor

Root.Tooltip: Equip Iron Armor for 15 seconds. Iron Armor is good at killing enemy core units and control the air. Can use Cluster Electromagnetic Missile, Reactor Overload, and Subatom Barrier.
Root.Name: Iron Armor

Root.Tooltip: You haven't picked up the corresponding blueprints.
Root.Name: Unknown Technology

Root.Tooltip: Throw Tychus’ Grenade to target location, dealing 75 damage.
Root.Name: The Bro's Grenade

Root.Tooltip: Summon 1 Shooting Drones around Raynor to provide more fire powers. Each drones can deal 1 damage and it is stackable. The stacked shooting assistant will increase the damage by 4.
Root.Name: Shooting Assistant

Root.Tooltip: Raynor lose all commands except The Bulldog after activated. Raynor will load 4 shots. Units killed by "You are a Mortal!" will create energy explosion. After the Bulldog run out of loads, this status will be ended earlier.
Root.Name: The Bulldog

Root.Tooltip: Deploy The Space Fragmentation to target location and create a forcefield which slows enemy's movement speed by 0% and deals 0 damage per second. Lasts for 10 seconds.
Root.Name: The Space Fragmentation

Root.Tooltip: Heal Raynor300, and increase movement and attack speed of Raynor by 30%. Lasts for 20 seconds.
Root.Name: The Wine of Immortality

Root.Tooltip: Call down a Caesar Planetary Fortress at target location. Caesar Planetary Fortress has 2400 health. Can last for 60 seconds. It can deal 120 damage each attack, and force nearby air units to drop to the ground.
Root.Name: The Over-Daytime Rome

Root.Tooltip: Call down Hyperion to temporarily support Raynor. Hyperion will launch Orbital Strike and destroy everything within its path.
Root.Name: Hyperion

Root.Tooltip:
An unknown blueprint will drop with some probabilities when Raynor, Mercernaries, and his ally kill an enemy. The more you kill, the higher the probability is. Once a blueprint drop, the proability of next blueprint will reduce back to initial probability. When the blueprint has been picked up, it will provide either Swann's Armory a new gear or Stetmann's Laboratory a upgrade to existing gear.

You can order SCV to help pickup the blueprint.
Root.Name: Little Gizmo of the Raider

Root.Tooltip: Grant Raynor detection and additional sight range.
Root.Name: Be Careful

Root.Tooltip: Increase maximum health of Raynor by 200, and significantly increase his life regeneration speed.
Root.Name: Cowboy Never Die

Root.Tooltip: Enable Raynor to gain additional 400 shield when switching the equipment. Last for 10 seconds.
Root.Name: Old Friend Tassdar's Gift
